#summary ProjectGenerator command line options

{{{
ProjectGenerator  1.0.0.0 - Copyright c Paul Lasarev 2008-2009
Template project generator

Usage: ProjectGenerator [options]
Options:
     -cache           Also -c. Cache .args.template files
  -? -help            Show this help list
     -help2           Show an additional help list
     -name:PARAM      Also -n:PARAM. Define name=value pair (optional)
     -out:PARAM       Also -o:PARAM. Output path (optional, default='.')
     -overwrite       Also -w. Overwrite output files
     -template:PARAM  Also -t:PARAM. Template path (required)
     -usage           Show usage syntax and exit
     -verbose         Also -v. Verbose output
  -V -version         Display version and licensing information



Please report bugs at <http://code.google.com/p/projectgenerator/issues/entry>
}}}
